com.topcoder.util.file.fieldconfig
Class TemplateFields

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.file.fieldconfig.NodeList
      com.topcoder.util.file.fieldconfig.TemplateFields

public class TemplateFields
extends NodeList

This class represents the root of the structure used to configure programmatically the template data. It is a subclass of NodeList.

Thread-safety: This class is immutable and therefore thread-safe.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.1
Author:
adic, roma, ShindouHikaru, biotrail
